descriptionHtml:
Don't worry! Won't make them instant-kill, but much more dangerous...

Quick attempt to improve ALL traps damage. Vanilla traps are just a nuisance. No thrill at all.
This mod increases the damage for all traps by 3.8x, and adds even more deadly damage for physics based traps (chain spike balls etc.).
No more barbarians hack'n'slash-like gameplay... be cautious now!
I've seen some other mods altering traps but they all edited trap by trap in a complicated way sometimes including extra scripting, made heavy customizations, and have problems with every new Skyrim update. This one instead is much more game/mods-friendly and just alters some multipliers and preserves internal damage scaling system. Quick and simple with a generic effect over ALL kind of traps, and works well...
I like simplified mod solutions without heavy scripting and the rest! :)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]USKP[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23833]SMPC[/url] compatible.

Will affect all kind of traps:

Falling rocks
Mace traps
Skull Ram traps
Bear traps
Swinging blades
Spears
Wall traps
Threshers
Poisoned dart traps
Fire traps
...

Added 'Dart trap harder' in the file section to increase damage amount of dart traps (only)!
Now supported also flamesthrowers and fire-traps!

Recommended additional mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50469]Physics Impact Damage Fix[/url]

SKYRIM UNDER THE RADAR MODS EP.4 review (min 2:33)
[youtube]jK7FDM9qTaE#t=155s[/youtube]
author: Hexaae
